item.title: The Uncelebrated Whimsy of Princeton's Own Lexical Database, Wordnet
item.description: If you use Wordnet as an extension to your text editor, you may eventually begin to wonder what is up with all the nutsy downward sloping oddly indented syntax. Then you might go here, to wikipedia, and read up on all the madness. Or you can browse a few of the tidbits we've pasted below. This Summary is From Wordnet's Website WordNet superficially resembles a thesaurus, in that it groups words together based on their meanings.
